title: Winter Self
marks: Signature and Mark LRC, in pencil: [Micah 1984]; LLC, in pencil: [Win
description: human figure wearing thick jacket with hood around head, leaning against table; resting face in PR hand; closed book on table at LR; rendered in greys
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
